name: Global Summit on Food Science and Technology
content: The Apex global meetings takes the pleasure to invite you to the “Global summit on Food Science and Technology (FOODTECH 2024)” The theme of the conference highlights “Development of new food processes, products, and technology”. Scientific Tracks designed for this conference will enable the attendees and participants to learn extremes. Which will be held as a conference during August 22-24, 2024 Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
